events.name: Singapore SQL PASS Chapter - December 2016 Meetup
events.description: Dear All, Its meetup time again at Singapore SQL PASS Chapter.  Please refer below for the details. Agenda: December 21st - 6:45 PM to 7 PM - Registration and Snacks 7 PM to 8 PM - Topic 1 - Presentation by Nagaraj Venkatesan 8:00 PM to 8:15 - Break 8:15 PM to 9:15 - Topic 2 - Presentation by Dharmendra Keshari Location: Microsoft Office, One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorium Topic 1:  R and SQL Server 2016 Synopsis: "R", a popular statistical language among data scientists has been integrated with SQL Server 2016. Now, with SQL Server 2016, one gets to perform the data retrival and statistical compute in one box. The session will provide an overview on how R works with SQL Server 2016 and the benifits of using Microsoft R in data science process. The session will also provide a quick introduction for T SQL Deveoplers and DBAs on how "R" code can be deployed to SQL Server 2016. Speaker Profile: Nagaraj Venkatesan Nagaraj Venkatesan, a SQL Server enthusiast exploring SQL Server for the last 10 years. Working for NCS Pte Ltd as SQL Server DBA, Nagaraj maintains databases used by one of the busiest public facing applications in the city. He frequently blogs at strictlysql.blogspot.com and is a regular contributor sqlservercentral.com. Besides these, he also holds a Masters Degree in Computing from National University of Singapore Topic 2:  SQL Server on Linux Synopsis: The announcement of SQL Server on Linux brings a significant technological and operation shift to enterprise relational database management system. It is vital to understand the features and capabilities. The agenda of the session -  Introduction to SQL Server on Linux -  How SQL Server is running on Linux (How I think - Microsoft has done it) -  Demos Speaker Profile: Dharmendra Keshari Dharmendra Keshari has strong and in-depth experience in Database Management and its internals. Currently, working as Senior Database Administrator in one of the best organization in Singapore. He is an avid, regular mentor on social media, helping several enthusiast in solving problems related to Database management. He has completed certification for “Microsoft SQL Server® 2008, Implementation” and “Maintenance & Administering Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Database”
events.location: Microsoft Auditorium (Singapore), One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorium, Singapore 018989

events.name: Singapore Magento User Group Meetup - Dec 2016
events.description: Date: Wednesday, 21 Dec 2016Venue: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina BoulevardLevel 22,[masked], SingaporeTime: 7:00 - 9:00PMConference room: 22BR-01 Agenda:  1. Magento 2 EE vs CE by Aman. Magento 2 is getting popularity and this talk will be focusing on the comparison of Magento 2 EE and CE edition. Aman is a Certified Magento developer and working as a Software engineer in Ranosys Technologies since long time. Want to speak or share your experiece with community? Send message to me. Connect with us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/SingaporeMagentoUserGroup/<a href="https://www.meetup.com/Singapore-Magento-User-Group/"></a> Pizza and drink are sponsor by Microsoft Singapore :)
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, 018989, Singapore
